title: 4fo2tkirxw
author: 4fo2tkirxw
content: Does anyone know where you can get broadcasts faster than?If you would be so kind as to send the link

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: you created this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400755.msg60256749#msg60256749 and there are so many suggestions there, is it better to try one by one every suggested bookies, and isn't the speed of streaming depending on your internet speed

comments.author: Maslate
comments.body: Quote from: 4fo2tkirxw on June 01, 2022, 01:21:50 PM Does anyone know where you can get broadcasts faster than?If you would be so kind as to send the linkIf you like the fast broadcast of the live games and you are not satisfied with what the sportsbooks have offered, then maybe try to have an IPTV subscription, I think they have better broadcast and offered different types of live sports, however, you have to pay for the subscription.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: Wapfika on June 01, 2022, 03:06:43 PMBTW sportsbook live score is updated split with just a minimal delay that is not noticeable. I think OP wants to find a live source so that he can bet in advance during live to take advantage on the minor delay on score in sportsbook.LOL no the delay of streams on sportsbooks is not minor neither unnoticeable, it usually lasts several seconds and even dozens of seconds sometimes. If you try to follow the event on the radio or TV you will notice how long is this delay. But usually markets are instantly suspended when something happens in the match and live bets take a delay to be accepted and placed, then I don't think it gives a real advantage to have a faster stream at the end.

comments.author: fiulpro
comments.body: Quote from: Maslate on June 01, 2022, 02:57:50 PMQuote from: 4fo2tkirxw on June 01, 2022, 01:21:50 PM Does anyone know where you can get broadcasts faster than?If you would be so kind as to send the linkIf you like the fast broadcast of the live games and you are not satisfied with what the sportsbooks have offered, then maybe try to have an IPTV subscription, I think they have better broadcast and offered different types of live sports, however, you have to pay for the subscription. Even if you don't get IPTV and watch for free you would be having advertisment every 5 minutes and would be redirected so often that you might wanna kill yourself and not go on with watching the whole match and at the same time the quality of videos on the sites , gambling sites perse would be bad as well, it's very good idea and can be seen as a long term investment since these subscriptions are not for a lot and at the same time you can share it. Make bets on your phone on any site and watch everything on the TV that would work best ! But do not create multiple threads because the answer would remain same from people.

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: 4fo2tkirxw on June 01, 2022, 01:21:50 PMDoes anyone know where you can get broadcasts faster than?You will always have some delay or lags watching livestreams sport events over internet so it would be fastest if you watch something live, but you can listen just audio with radio that can be faster.There is no way you can trick bookmakers and betting websites with this trick that can give you maybe few seconds of advantage.

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: Livestreams will always be delayed. There's another way tho, but it requires some investment. There are many API service providers, you may get lucky with a few low-tier games where your API service is a bit faster than bet365 itself. You will have to do extensive research tho. And bet365 limits max bets for such games. So there are a lot of hoops. You can't beat the house this way.or you can be present at the game yourselfwatch this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kvT_yIVI2QwNot sure if it still works tho lol, maybe for a few leagues and slow umpires?

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: 4fo2tkirxw on June 01, 2022, 01:21:50 PM Does anyone know where you can get broadcasts faster than?If you would be so kind as to send the linkYou cant watch on tv or any live stream faster as it makes delay to public even it is slower on live telecast via Facebook or other social media. To know the result faster than tv program or any live stream you have to watch the match on the playground. Otherwise I do not think their is any service from where you can watch/see faster.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: If you want to watch a match almost in real time, you will need to tune into some live radio or TV broadcast. Live streams over the Internet will always be with little delay.However, don't expect it to give you any advantage because casinos are well aware of such methods and they can easily identify bets that are exploiting any loopholes in the system.

comments.author: Maslate
comments.body: Quote from: fiulpro on June 01, 2022, 06:54:31 PMQuote from: Maslate on June 01, 2022, 02:57:50 PMQuote from: 4fo2tkirxw on June 01, 2022, 01:21:50 PM Does anyone know where you can get broadcasts faster than?If you would be so kind as to send the linkIf you like the fast broadcast of the live games and you are not satisfied with what the sportsbooks have offered, then maybe try to have an IPTV subscription, I think they have better broadcast and offered different types of live sports, however, you have to pay for the subscription. Even if you don't get IPTV and watch for free you would be having advertisment every 5 minutes and would be redirected so often that you might wanna kill yourself and not go on with watching the whole match and at the same time the quality of videos on the sites , gambling sites perse would be bad as well, it's very good idea and can be seen as a long term investment since these subscriptions are not for a lot and at the same time you can share it. Make bets on your phone on any site and watch everything on the TV that would work best ! But do not create multiple threads because the answer would remain same from people. That's why IPTV is the better option than relying on free streaming that has some advertisements. I don't know if there's another best way, but as for me, the best way so far is only IPTV. I think there are plenty of providers we can choose from, those providers that has good servers for their IPTV service.

comments.author: Saint-loup
comments.body: Quote from: edgycorner on June 01, 2022, 08:14:57 PMLivestreams will always be delayed. There's another way tho, but it requires some investment. There are many API service providers, you may get lucky with a few low-tier games where your API service is a bit faster than bet365 itself. You will have to do extensive research tho. And bet365 limits max bets for such games. So there are a lot of hoops. You can't beat the house this way.or you can be present at the game yourselfwatch this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kvT_yIVI2QwNot sure if it still works tho lol, maybe for a few leagues and slow umpires?May I ask you what do you call an "API service provider" please? It's a service allowing you to place bets without using the graphical user interface of the sportsbook or it's a service offering fast live streaming? You say bet365 limits max bets for such games, you mean bet365 closely monitor those providers and is aware of all events broadcasted by them? On most of sportsbooks you can't place instant bets on live events, there is always a delay between when you placed a bet and when it is accepted by the sportsbook. And if an event happens during this lap of time or if odds change, your bet will be rejected.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: Strongkored on June 01, 2022, 02:25:00 PMyou created this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400755.msg60256749#msg60256749 and there are so many suggestions there, is it better to try one by one every suggested bookies, and isn't the speed of streaming depending on your internet speedThe problem with OP is that either he does not read the replies on the thread or he does not care to answer the question which people are asking him. Only if he can respond to people in a better way, people will understand his query more clearly and will respond with more relevant answers.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: 4fo2tkirxw on June 01, 2022, 01:21:50 PM Does anyone know where you can get broadcasts faster than?If you would be so kind as to send the linkWhat do you mean by broadcast faster? If you mean a betting site that you want the matches you are watching or tracking the updates in in-play matches updates as fast as possible, I think you can use any betting site that does that, betting sites are some seconds slower, they are some seconds slower because they do not want bettors to manipulate.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on June 10, 2022, 06:51:08 AMWhat do you mean by broadcast faster? If you mean a betting site that you want the matches you are watching or tracking the updates in in-play matches updates as fast as possible, I think you can use any betting site that does that, betting sites are some seconds slower, they are some seconds slower because they do not want bettors to manipulate.Even if they are faster or up to par on most streaming sites it still won't matter since there's usually a bit of delay when you place a live bet and that delay could vary between 5-15 seconds. Also, live odds are always several seconds ahead so it's close to impossible for anyone to take advantage of a faster stream and if you manage to get away with it you'll eventually get limited by the bookies.Quote from: Saint-loup on June 04, 2022, 07:45:46 AMOn most of sportsbooks you can't place instant bets on live events, there is always a delay between when you placed a bet and when it is accepted by the sportsbook. And if an event happens during this lap of time or if odds change, your bet will be rejected. It's still possible for us to prevent those rejected live bets as some sportsbooks usually have a setting that forces our bet to push through even if the odds changes but the downside with that setting is that we don't always get our preferred odds in time unless there's a small break happening.

Only if he can respond to people in a better way, people will understand his query more clearly and will respond with more relevant answers.It is a common thing that a person open a topic and then ignore his/her own topic. Anyway, till now there is almost no answer which refers directly to the answer of the question of the Op. So, it might be a reason for not to replying or following of the topic. In this case we can't blame the OP.
